Amalgamated Bank 
CORPORATE 
GOVERNANCE
At Amalgamated Bank, we believe that exceptional 
business behavior starts with a commitment to 
strong corporate governance.THE BOARD INCLUDES THE 
FOLLOWING COMMITTEES:
• Audit Committee
• Compensation and Human Resources Committee
• Governance and Nominating Committee 
•  Executive and Corporate Social  
Responsibility Committee
• Enterprise Risk Oversight Committee
• Trust Committee
• Credit Policy CommitteeOur corporate governance policies set 
clear expectations and responsibilities 
for our leaders, employees and 
business partners to ensure we conduct 
our operations in a manner that is 
consistent with the highest standards of 
business ethics. Our Board of Directors 
is collectively responsible for the 
leadership, management and long-term 
success of the company. Meetings are 
held regularly throughout the year to 
review our operations and discuss our 
business plans and strategies.Amalgamated Bank 42
